## BigNumber.isZero() method

Returns `true` if the value of this BigNumber is zero or minus zero, otherwise returns `false`<!-- -->.

```ts
x = new BigNumber(-0)
x.isZero()                 // true
```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isZero(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
